references.paper_title: Matrix factorization techniques for recommender systems
references.reason: This paper is foundational to collaborative filtering, introducing matrix factorization, a widely used technique in recommender systems.
This paper introduces Adversarial Collaborative Filtering (ACF), a key concept that the current paper builds upon and improves.

references.paper_title: BPR: Bayesian personalized ranking from implicit feedback
references.reason: This paper introduces Bayesian Personalized Ranking (BPR), a widely used loss function in recommender systems, which is used as a basis for the proposed method.

references.paper_title: Robust recommender system: A survey and future directions
references.reason: This survey paper provides a comprehensive overview of robust recommender systems, contextualizing the current work within the broader field.

references.paper_title: A survey of collaborative filtering techniques
references.reason: This survey paper provides a broad overview of collaborative filtering techniques, serving as a foundation for understanding the context of the current work.
